# Humanities, Arts, and Design Lessons

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/humanities-arts-and-design-lesson-plans-in-fortnite-creative
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:57:14.351190

---

Use these lessons in your classroom as standalone class activities, or as part of a larger subject. These lesson plans cover one or more of a range of subjects, including art, design, music, history, social studies, geography, and reading and writing.
